Alt-Sendme is a free, open-source tool for direct peer-to-peer file transfer. It allows users to send any file or folder of any size or format directly between devices without using cloud storage, ensuring end-to-end encryption and privacy.

DeepSeek OCR is a modern web application for Optical Character Recognition, featuring a React frontend and FastAPI backend. It supports processing both individual images and entire multi-page PDF documents, with advanced features like formula and formatting preservation, and allows exporting results into various formats including Markdown, HTML, DOCX, and JSON.

GoBackup is a Go-based CLI tool designed for application servers to automate the backup of databases and files. It supports scheduled backups to various cloud storage services, offering features like encryption, compression, and notifications for a low-maintenance, secure backup solution.

Beszel is a lightweight, self-hosted server monitoring platform that collects historical data, tracks Docker container statistics, and provides configurable alerts. It features a user-friendly web interface, supports multi-user and OAuth authentication, and offers automatic backup capabilities.

nginx-ignition is a Go-based web UI for managing Nginx configurations, designed for developers and enthusiasts. It simplifies the setup and management of virtual hosts, streams, SSL certificates, and server settings through an intuitive interface, offering both direct Nginx control and configuration file generation.
